# About

This is a _template_ book written for the Danish Flora and vegetation course.

## Usage 

Each chapter would be a week within the course, were the first weeks would be generalities about Danish flora (for example most common species in Denmark)



```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'
), 'packages.bib')
```
